title: Gifts for everyone
body: league of legends is a fun game that involves in game currency (rp) and some of us dont have the ability to purchase some. After a certain amount of time, I think that riot games should award their loyal and supportive members with a little gift like a ward skin or mystery chest or even some rp at the end of each season to celebrate a successful year.

replies.body: Already an upcoming feature. Read more about it [here](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/site/2016-season-update/champion-mastery.html).
